title: Butter Chicken Quarrel: Court drama gets spicier with new evidence
description: Butter Chicken Moti Mahal: A court battle over the origins of butter chicken heats up as two Indian restaurant chains, Moti Mahal and Daryaganj, clash in Delhi High Court. Claims and counter-claims emerge about who truly invented the dish, with photographic and video evidence adding spice to the legal feud. The case continues to capture global attention.
